title: Tools
description: Tracking tools, ultrasound probes, and surgical instruments for image-guided interventions.

Scalpel.description: Generic scalpel (100mm long handle, 20mm long blade).

Cautery.description: Generic cautery (95mm long handle, 20mm long blade).

Stylus_100mm.description: Pointer tool with built-in sensor holder. 100mm long, sharp tip.

Stylus_60mm.description: Pointer tool with built-in sensor holder. 60mm long, sharp tip.

Stylus_Candycane_100mm_WithHolder.description: Pointer tool with built-in sensor holder. 100mm long, curved tip for ultrasound calibration.

Stylus_Candycane_70mm_1.0.description: Pointer tool with built-in sensor holder. 70mm long, curved tip for ultrasound calibration.

UsProbe_Ultrasonix_EC9-5_10.description: Ultrasonix EC9-5/10 endocavity curvilinear ultrasound probe.
